entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
